    • Constructor Detail

      • GUI

        public GUI(Application app)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • createFrame

        private void createFrame()
        Creates the frame, requiring a minimum size defined as the maximum size of the frame of the actual workspace.

      • addFields

        private void addFields()
        Creates the left and right panel, adding them to the frame. It also creates an array of buttons that will be enabled or disabled and JTextFields that could be altered in the future by the user.

      • generateLeft

        private javax.swing.JPanel generateLeft()
        Creates the left part of the Frame, including the fileChoser panel, parametrosLongMethodPanel panel, botoesFeatureEnvyPanel panel, feautureEnvyButtonPanel panel and indicatorsTable panel with all the labels, text field boxes, buttons and option panes associated to them. In the fileChoser panel, when the load button is selected it opens an Excel file, while when the show button is selected it opens the Excel program with the selected file. In the parametrosLongMethodPanel panel, the JLabel linesOfCode as well as the JLabel cyclomaticComplexity only accept numbers in its argument. The JPanel longMetodPanel creates the button long method which when pressed, will execute the long method and the defect detection to the values previously defined. The JPanel botoesFeatureEnvyPanel creates the JLabel atfd label and the JLabel laa label and posteriorly changes the JTextField laa_txt and JTextField atfd_txt, accepting integer or double numbers. In The JPanel feautureEnvyButtonPanel the button Feature Envy is created which will execute the feature envy and the defect detection for the values defined by the user. The JPanel indicatorsTable creates and adds the several tables to the frame.
        Returns:
        the JPanel with the left part of the Frame.

      • createSubLeft

        private javax.swing.JPanel[] createSubLeft(int n)
        Array of panels with a preferred border.
        Parameters:
        n - size of the JPanel panels array.
        Returns:
        the panels array.

        private javax.swing.JPanel createTitlePanel(java.lang.String string,
                                            int font,
                                            int x,
                                            int y)
        Panel with a title in the middle with a set Text positioning
        Parameters:
        string - for the title panel
        font - for the title panel
        x - dimension
        y - dimension
        Returns:
        the JPanel with the Title Panel with the title in the middle

      • createButton

        public javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String name,
                                        int x,
                                        int y,
                                        int font,
                                        int pos)
        Creates a button with the title, dimension and font options.
        Parameters:
        name - String name for the button.
        x - dimension
        y - dimension
        font - letters style for the button Text
        pos - the position for the buttons array
        Returns:
        the JButton with the attributes passed

      • createAndAddTableJLabel

        private void createAndAddTableJLabel(java.lang.String name,
                                     javax.swing.border.Border border,
                                     int font,
                                     javax.swing.JPanel table)
        Creates and adds a table to a determined panel. The definedRules is the only label in which the font is equal to eleven. If so the label points to the definedRules.
        Parameters:
        name - for the new label.
        border - size.
        font - letters style for the table JLabel.
        table - to be added to the panel.

      • createTableJTextField

        private void createTableJTextField(int pos,
                                   javax.swing.border.Border border,
                                   javax.swing.JPanel indicatorsTable)
        In the array textFields it is created a JTextField and adds it to the corresponding table.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the text fields
        border - the border to be added in the panel
        indicatorsTable - the panel to have the border added

      • generateRight

        private javax.swing.JPanel generateRight()
        Right part of the frame. It is create a String array with all the names for the column and then adds it to the frame, posteriorly setting the columns sizes, and its corresponding maximum and minimum widths.
        Returns:
        the JPanel with the right part of the frame.

      • fillTable

        public void fillTable()
        Firstly, sets the row count to 0 and after it fills the table accordingly, with the file uploaded.

      • fillLongMethod

        private void fillLongMethod()
        Fills the is long method column.

      • fillFeature_envy

        private void fillFeature_envy()
        Fills the column of the is feature envy by iterating the getsMethodsData and posteriorly setting the corresponding values.

        Parameters:

        countersPmd - array of integers.

        Receives and places on the Graphical User Interface (GUI) the results from the rules defined.
        Parameters:

        counters - array of integers.

        Clears previous results from the text fields.
